name: Audi R8 Render
preview: I created Audi R8 LMS 2011 car model which is my favorite racing car!
description: I used blender to model and render the scene. I used cycles render engine to render out the scene and then using after effects and premiere, I was able to Colorgrade the video and also add camerashake to give the render a natural look. Textures are designed pocedurally using substance painter
